ud5.9:1: Thus I heard:At one time the Gracious One was walking on walking tour amongst the Kosalans, together with a great Community of monks. Then at that time a great many young brāhmaṇas were passing by not far from the Gracious One in a mocking manner. The Gracious One saw those many young brāhmaṇas passing by not far away in a mocking manner.
ud5.9:2: Then the Gracious One, having understood the significance of it, on that occasion uttered this exalted utterance:
ud5.9:3: "The forgetful, speaking unsuitable words,thoughappearing to be wise,Stretching their mouths as much as they want, are led on by what they don’t understand."
